channel.title: Lessons on kama sona
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons on kama sona

item.title: lesson one: sounds
item.description: toki pona has 14 letters, 9 consonants and 5 vowels. consonants letter sound k kill l let m met n net p pit s sit t tool w wet j yet Notice that j is not prononuced like the letter J in english, but rather the letter Y.

item.title: lesson two: toki!
item.description: vocabulary jan human, person, someone moku eat, drink, consume, food, ingest mi I, me, myself, mine, my pona good, simple, fix, repair sina you, yours, you all, y'all's suli big, tall, long, important grammatical vocabulary li li is one of the most important words in toki pona.
